ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( $CustomMetadata.Custom_Feature_Enablement__mdt.Subscription_Orders.Feature_is_Enabled__c=true, $CustomMetadata.Custom_Feature_Enablement__mdt.Sizing_Method.Feature_is_Enabled__c=true), OR( AND( ISCHANGED(Value_of_NMC__c), PRIORVALUE(Value_of_NMC__c)!=0 ), AND( ISCHANGED(Size_Ratio__c), PRIORVALUE(Size_Ratio__c)!=1 ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Value of NMC or Size Ratio cannot be changed after it's been created. If you need to change the values, please create a new record, and relate it to the appropriate shared solar systems. This is to ensure that we track all subscription changes.
